title: Glasgow impress with bonus-point win at Sale in Champions Cup opener
description: Glasgow Warriors enjoy a dream opening night in the Champions Cup with a bonus-point away win over Sale Sharks.

title: Seth Curry sends three-word message to Warriors after reuniting with team

title: Beloved Warriors center Kevon Looney sends clear reminder of insane NBA talent
